attributes.action: Review use of abuse allegations in family court and immigration decisions
attributes.additional_details: Allegations of domestic abuse can have serious and lasting consequences in family court and immigration-related cases, affecting housing, legal aid, financial settlements, parental access, reputation and mental health. While genuine victims must be protected, unproven allegations can cause irreversible harm. Reviewing safeguards, evidence standards and early fact-finding would help ensure fairness, due process and equal treatment before the law.
